techmeme.title: Cloudflare reports Q2 revenue up 30% YoY to $401M, vs. $394.7M est., and raises its full-year 2024 forecast; NET jumps 10%+ after hours (Yuvraj Malik/Reuters)
Apple's Q3 revenue in Greater China was down 6.5% YoY to $14.7B , up 5.7% YoY to $5.1B in Japan, and up 13.5% YoY to $6.4B in the rest of Asia-Pacific (Nikkei Asia)
Court filings: AI startups Suno and Udio respond to copyright lawsuits from major music labels, saying their use of proprietary music to train AI is fair use (Bill Donahue/Billboard)
A US appeals court blocks the FCC's reinstatement of net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge (David Shepardson/Reuters)
Coinbase reports Q2 revenue up 105% YoY to $1.45B, vs. $1.39B est., a $36.2M net income, and forecasts subscription and services Q3 revenue below expectations (Bill Peters/MarketWatch)
